verse:
यः सर्वज्ञः सर्वविद्यस्यैष महिमा भुवि दिव्ये ब्रह्मपुरे ह्येष व्योम्न्यात्मा प्रतिष्ठितः ।
मनोमयः प्राणशरीरनेता प्रतिष्ठितोऽन्ने हृदयं सन्निधाय तद्विज्ञानेन परिपश्यन्ति धीरा आनन्दरूपममृतं यद् विभाति ॥

terms.प्राणशरीरनेता: the controller of the vital energy and physical body

meaning: Meaning:He who is omniscient, who possesses the greatness of all knowledge, exists in the divine abode, which is the world, and is the soul pervading the universe. He is established as the controller of the vital energy and physical body, consisting of the mind. Placed near the heart, through that wisdom, the wise ones perceive him as the form of bliss, immortal and shining forth.
